welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Estancia Velha, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and rich culture. We are delighted to have you and invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nossa Senhora de Fátima Aerodrome is a modern and spacious building, offering a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Nossa Senhora de Fátima Aerodrome is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities and technology to handle a wide range of cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
